title: Rimmonim (Torah finials) (one of a pair)
description: lobed design with 5 bells on bottom lobe, 4 bells near top; central filigree decoration; floral designs on lobes; openwork crown topped with bird
provenance: (Weisberg Religious Articles, New York); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased 2/9/88; Gift to the MIA in 2002.
creditline: Gift of Mickey and Harold Smith
